duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist in planning, writing and managing e-blasts, newsletters, and press releases
Update and maintain social media presence, including monitoring, posting, scheduling, and reporting, while providing creative input
Assist in the management of website SEO and content development
Support marketing team and assist with activities as assigned

education_certification.credential: Enrolled in a 4-year degree granting institution studying communications or marketing, or be a recent graduate
